traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the hraptnon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hraptnon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undying
entries: Unless the hraptnon's Stillborn Heart is removed from its pool, the hraptnon's death is temporary. One of its countless xakalonus offspring grows into the hraptnon in 24 hours.
In addition, the hraptnon loses its immunities if the Stillborn Heart is removed from the pool.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hraptnon makes three melee attacks: one bite and two claws. Alternatively, the hraptnon can make two spine attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the hraptnon's next turn.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 27 (4d10 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spine
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 23 (4d8 + 5 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained}. The target must escape (DC 20) to remove the {@condition restrained} condition and be able to stand.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The hraptnon makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Baneful Howl (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hraptnon casts {@spell bane} as a 3rd level spell ({@dc 20} to resist).

legendary.name: Life Drain (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: One xakalonus within 30 feet of the hraptnon dies. The hraptnon regains hit points equal to half the hit points of the xakalonus that died.
